main.name: Adriana Valdiglesias
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: I am a Passionate Full Stack Web Developer leveraging a background in customer service. I'm knowledgeable in user interface, testing, and debugging processes. Effective at combining creativity and problem solving to develop user-friendly applications. I am proactive self-starter dedicated to continued learning. Experience developing software independently and within a team. Willingness to navigate ambiguous tasks, find suitable solutions and seek help/advice where appropriate. A positive contributor recognized for effective communication and organization abilities.
main.contactmessage: Interest in collaborating? or would like to simply reach me?

education.school: University of Connecticut school of Engineering
education.description: Intensive boot camp program focused on gaining technical programming and market-driven skills

work.title: Full-Stack Web Developer Intern
work.description: Scope, maintain, and implement new features. Fix bugs and improve site functionality.

skills.name: HTML, CSS, jQuery, Redux, Express.js, Bootstrap, Materialize, Material UI, Tailwind CSS, Next.js
skills.title: Web Development

skills.name: SQL, MongoDB, MySQL, JSON, AJAX, RESTful APIs
skills.title: Database and Analytics

skills.name: Heroku, Git, Miro, Figma, User Auth
skills.title: Tools and Technologies

projects.title: Hulu Clone (React JS)
projects.category: Mobile-first responsive Hulu application clone. Built with REACT.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. The movies populated in the app call the TMDB api.

projects.title: TakeOff (React JS)
projects.category: A travel planner and blogger application. Users can keep track of current and past trips with an itinerary creation capability. Allows the user to keep track of trip events and be more flexible.

projects.title: No Waste Kitchen
projects.category: A simple app that helps you find recipes with ingredients that you already have at home.

testimonials.text: Adriana is absolutely excellent, her depth of knowledge & her mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
